props.name: action
props.description: Callback fired when the component mounts

props.name: allowScrollButtonsMobile
props.description: If true, the scroll buttons aren't forced hidden on mobile

props.name: aria-label
props.description: The label for the Tabs as a string

props.name: aria-labelledby
props.description: An id or list of ids separated by a space that label the Tabs

props.name: centered
props.description: If true, the tabs will be centered

props.name: indicatorColor
props.description: Determines the color of the indicator

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback fired when the value changes

props.name: scrollButtons
props.description: Determine behavior of scroll buttons when tabs are set to scroll

props.name: selectionFollowsFocus
props.description: If true the selected tab changes on focus

props.name: TabIndicatorProps
props.description: Props applied to the tab indicator element

props.name: TabScrollButtonProps
props.description: Props applied to the TabScrollButton element

props.name: textColor
props.description: Determines the color of the Tab

props.name: value
props.description: The value of the currently selected Tab

props.name: variant
props.description: Determines additional display behavior of the tabs
